data: apartment of Mademoiselle Céleste Bouchard | Rue Clarisse | Paris
ON a certain day in June, 1901, a cataclysm occurred in the quiet apartment of Mademoiselle Céleste Bouchard, in the Rue Clarisse, the quietest street in the quietest part of Paris.
